title: Is neet 2021 going to be easy like 2020? - Quora
tags: National Eligibility and Entrance Test Advice
Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: Nothing is impossible. We have seen last 2 yrs question of NEET which were easier than last few yrs… but only for this reason u can't think that 2021 NEET will be more easy than 2020… question paper level vary from year to year…but we can conclude that if u want to get a gov MBBS seat u have to read NCERT lines, levelled diagram everything… u may follow related topics of ur coaching notes… So be ready and say yourself “question paper easy or moderate or difficult, I have to fight at any condition to wear most precious white appron and stethoscope" Best of luck.❤️

Hi dear,my answer for your question is “its unpredictable” because every year paper level varies..So Neet 2021 will either be easy like 2019 and 2020 or it may be tough ,now dont waste your time in thinking about the paper level ur preparation should be in such a way that ull attempt well no matter how the paper level is going to be Anyways Good luck❤
